Shadow_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Shadow Bolt. Shadow Blast sends focused negative Nictus energy at a foe. This attack can knock down foes and will leave the target's attack and movement speed slowed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
